name: The House of Chores and Tours
name_original: The House of Chores and Tours
description:
THE HOUSE OF CHORES & TOURS

Group Name: Mystery Box

Members:  
                         https://alvanoel.itch.io
                         https://kyledesquitado.itch.io/
                         https://setolivrz.itch.io
                         https://denise-taiza.itch.io

Game Summary:

House of Chores & Tours is a single-player simulation game played from a first person view. The player, in the shoes of a child, was asked by their parents to finish the house chores before they get back from work.

For 5 days, the player must finish all the assigned tasks in the to do list. Failing to accomplish at least one task in the list will require the player to repeat the same day and will cause them to lose 1 life. To win the game, the player must survive until the end of 5th day with at least 1 life remaining.

Controls:

  • WASD - Player movement
  • ALT - Enable/Disable cursor
  • E - Interact with an object
  • Mouse - Camera View
